hero.title: Invoice processing with artificial intelligence and
hero.subtitle: Extract, review, and approve invoices in minutes. Our AI does the heavy lifting while you keep full control.

features.sectionTitle: Everything you need for invoice processing
features.sectionSubtitle: From upload to approval – our platform covers the full workflow with AI support.

upload.title: Invoice upload
upload.description: Drag and drop one or many invoices. PDF, images, and scanned documents supported.

extraction.title: AI data extraction
extraction.description: Advanced OCR and ML models extract key fields with confidence scoring.

chat.title: Document chat
chat.description: Ask questions about any invoice. AI answers and can update extracted data.

audit.title: Audit trail
audit.description: Full history of all changes, approvals, and chat interactions.

demoSection.title: See it in action
demoSection.subtitle: Watch how InvoiceAI processes documents in real time.

pricing.title: Simple, transparent pricing
pricing.subtitle: Start free, upgrade when you're ready. No hidden fees.
pricing.planStarterDesc: Ideal for small businesses getting started
pricing.planProDesc: For growing teams with higher volume

cta.title: Ready to simplify invoice processing?
cta.subtitle: Over 500 companies use InvoiceAI to save time and reduce errors.

footer.tagline: Invoice processing with AI and human approval. Simplify your payables workflow.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.section1Body: By accessing or using this service, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree, do not use the service.
terms.section2Body: You may use the service only for lawful purposes and in accordance with these terms. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account and for all activity under your account.
terms.section3Body: You agree not to misuse the service, including by uploading illegal content, attempting to gain unauthorized access, or interfering with the service's operation. We may suspend or terminate accounts that violate these terms.
terms.section4Body: We may update these terms from time to time. We will notify you of material changes by posting the updated terms and updating the "Last updated" date. Continued use of the service after changes constitutes acceptance.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.section1Body: We collect information you provide when you register, use the service, or contact us. This may include your name, email address, organization details, and data you upload such as invoices.
privacy.section2Body: We use your information to provide and improve the service, to communicate with you, to enforce our terms, and to comply with legal obligations. We do not sell your personal data.
privacy.section3Body: We store your data securely and use industry-standard measures to protect it. Data is processed in accordance with applicable data protection laws.
privacy.section4Body: We may share your information with service providers who assist us in operating the service, or when required by law. We do not share your data with third parties for their marketing.
privacy.gdprBody: If you are in the European Economic Area, you have rights under the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), including the right to access, rectify, or erase your personal data, the right to restrict or object to processing, and the right to data portability. You may also lodge a complaint with a supervisory authority. To exercise these rights, contact us using the details provided in the service.
